info.title: Bokun API
info.description:
Further documentation of this api is available here.

You can generate a client in your preferred language using swagger editor

get.summary: Get all supported countries/nationalities
get.description: Get a list of all the available countries, along with the ISO code for each country.

activityType.description: Specifies the type of the activity.

bookingType.description: Specifies how the activity is booked: as a pass, date based, or date and time based.

scheduleType.description: Specifies how activity start times are scheduled. Only used if bookingType != PASS.

capacityType.description: Specifies whether capacity is limited, free sell, or on request.

passExpiryType.description: Only used if bookingType == PASS. Specifies how the pass expires after purchase.

meetingType.description: Describes how passengers meet at the beginning of a tour/activity.

passCapacity.description: Only used if bookingType == PASS and capacityType == LIMITED. Since passes are not date based, this is simply the global capacity for selling the pass: specifies how many total passes can be sold.

passAvailable.description: Only used if bookingType == PASS and capacityType == LIMITED. Specifies how many passes are currently available for booking.

dressCode.description: Specifies if there is a particular dress code that the participants need to adhere to. The type of dress code should be described in text items.

passportRequired.description: Whether passenger needs to bring their passport for this activity.

ticketPerPerson.description: Whether ticket is generated per person or per booking.

supportedAccessibilityTypes.description: Specifies whether the activity is suitable for individuals with accessibility issues.

startPoints.description: Only relevant if meetingType == MEET_ON_LOCATION or MEET_ON_LOCATION_OR_PICK_UP. List of all places where this activity can start or be joined.

guidanceTypes.description: Specifies the types of guidance on offer, along with what languages each is offered in.

activityCategories.description: A list of categories that the tour/activity/attraction falls into.

agendaItems.description: An optional list of agenda / itinerary items for this tour/activity.

attention.description: Text describing any points that need special attention for the passengers. May contain HTML.

baseLanguage.description: The language that the product description is written in. There may also be translations available.

bookableExtras.description: A list of extras available for this product. Note that not all of these extras may be available for all bookable items. For example, different rates may offer different extras.

bookingCutoffDays.description: The number of days before the activity when we stop accepting bookings.

bookingCutoffHours.description: The number of hours before the activity when we stop accepting bookings.

bookingCutoffMinutes.description: The number of minutes before the activity when we stop accepting bookings.

bookingCutoffWeeks.description: The number of weeks before the activity when we stop accepting bookings.

box.description: Specifies whether this is a boxed version of another product.

boxedActivityId.description: If this is a box, then this field holds the ID of the activity inside the box.

boxedVendor.description: If this is a box, then this field holds the ID of the vendor that owns the activity inside the box.

comboActivity.description: Specifies whether this is a combo activity.

customDropoffAllowed.description: Only relevant if dropoffService is TRUE. Specifies whether the customer should be allowed to enter their drop off place in free text.

customPickupAllowed.description: Only used if meetingType != MEET_ON_LOCATION. Specifies whether the customer should be allowed to enter their pick up place in free text.

description.description: Text describing this product. May contain HTML markup.

difficultyLevel.description: Specifies how physically demanding this tour/activity is.

dropoffPricingType.description: Deprecated. Pricing type for drop off is now specified in the rate.

dropoffService.description: Specifies whether this activity offers drop off service.

duration.description: Deprecated. Use duration minutes, hours, days and weeks instead.

durationDays.description: Duration in days. Total duration is calculated by summing the duration in minutes, hours, days, weeks.

durationHours.description: Duration in hours. Total duration is calculated by summing the duration in minutes, hours, days, weeks.

durationMinutes.description: Duration in minutes. Total duration is calculated by summing the duration in minutes, hours, days, weeks.

durationType.description: Deprecated. Use duration minutes, hours, days and weeks instead.

durationWeeks.description: Duration in weeks. Total duration is calculated by summing the duration in minutes, hours, days, weeks.

excerpt.description: A short, non-HTML text (max 255 chars) describing the product.

externalId.description: A short unique code for the product. Also called product code.

flags.description: Optional list of flags which the product owner has added to the product. Flags are just simple text labels.

included.description: Optional text describing what is included when you book this product. May contain HTML markup.

excluded.description: Optional text describing what is excluded when you book this product. May contain HTML markup.

keyPhoto.description: The photo selected for use as the key photo for the product in lists and overviews.

keywords.description: A list of keywords describing the product.

languages.description: A list of languages which the product content is available in.

lastPublished.description: The date that the product content was last changed.

locationCode.description: The city that represents the main location for this activity. Specified as a location from the United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations (UN/LOCODE).

minAge.description: Represents the age limit for the activity, if any.

nextDefaultPrice.description: The price for 1 person in the default category, assuming the future departure date nearest in time to the current time.

photos.description: A list of photos showcasing this product.

pickupAllotment.description: Whether pick up has separate capacity from the activity (for example, activity can take 60 pax but the pick up bus can only take 30).

pickupMinutesBefore.description: Specifies how many minutes before departure the pick up service starts.

pickupPricingType.description: Deprecated. Pick up pricing is now specified in the rate.

pickupService.description: Deprecated. Pick up service is now specified in meetingType.

pricingCategories.description: A list of all pricing categories offered by this product.

productCategory.description: The product category, will be one of: ACTIVITIES, ACCOMMODATION, TRANSPORT, CAR_RENTALS

productGroupId.description: The commission group this product belongs to, if any.

requirements.description: A text describing what you need to bring for this activity. May contain HTML.

route.description: Optional travel directions that show the start point, end point, and any waypoints in between.

slug.description: Human readable string that may be used to identify the product.

startTimes.description: Only used if bookingType == DATE_AND_TIME. A list of scheduled start times for this tour/activity.

vendor.description: The company that operates this activity.

videos.description: A list of videos showcasing the product.

cancellationPolicy.description: A cancellation policy, describing any cancellation fees incurred when cancelling bookings.

defaultRateId.description: The ID of the default rate for this activity.

rates.description: A list of all rates offered by the product.

hasOpeningHours.description: Specifies whether this product has specific opening hours.

defaultOpeningHours.description: Only used if hasOpeningHours == true. The default opening hours by weekday. These may be overridden by seasonal opening hours.

seasonalOpeningHours.description: Optional seasonal opening hours. If date falls within the season then this will override the default opening hours.

refundAmount.description: Refund amount (if 0 and refund == true, then full amount is refunded)

remainInvoiced.description: Specify whether the product should remain on customer invoice after being cancelled
